graph_title: 총 산업부가가치 중 소규모(small-scale) 산업 비율
indicator_name: 총 산업 부가가치 중 소규모 산업 비율
target_name: 소규모 산업체의 가치사슬 및 시장으로의 통합 및 금융서비스 접근가능성 강화(특히 개도국)

en.target: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets
en.title: Proportion of small-scale industries in total industry value added
en.indicator_name: Proportion of small-scale industries in total industry value added
en.national_indicator_description: This indicator is defined as the share of manufacturing value added of small-scale manufacturing enterprises  in the total manufacturing value added.
en.global_metadata_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)

en.graph_title: Proportion of small-scale industries in total industry value added
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
